remarks.format: ## Remarks HTTP 是无状态的协议，和`VIEWSTATE`是一个用来跨多个请求保留客户端更改的机制。HTTP is a stateless protocol, and `VIEWSTATE` is one mechanism used to persist client changes across multiple requests. 在网页上的每个控件包含属性，表示客户端进行任何更改的累计。Each control on a Web page contains a property, which represents the accumulation of any changes made by the client. 在 Web 窗体页中，这些更改进行编码为回发数据中`value`的 html``具有元素`type`属性`hidden`。In a Web Forms page, these changes are encoded in postback data as the `value` of an HTML `` element with a `type` attribute of `hidden`. 例如:For example: ``` ``` 如果`true`、 非字母字符中`VIEWSTATE`通过浏览器中，也不中间网关，值将不正确发送。 若要纠正此问题，服务器控件适配器替换中的非字母字符`VIEWSTATE`替换为不需要 HTTP 请求中的编码的值。To correct this, server-control adapters replace non-alphabetic characters in the `VIEWSTATE` value with ones that do not require encoding in HTTP requests. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何确定浏览器是否需要`VIEWSTATE`值进行特殊编码。The following code example shows how to determine whether the browser requires `VIEWSTATE` values to be specially encoded. remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的值可以派生自设定的字符大小和实际屏幕像素大小。The returned value can be derived from the assumed character size and actual screen pixel size. 确定高度的算法使用默认字体大小 （从.config 文件），浏览器特定大小 （同样，从.config 文件） 和显式发送的浏览器的标头的组合。The algorithm for determining the height uses a combination of the default font sizes (from a .config file), browser-specific sizes (again, from a .config file), and explicit headers sent by the browser. 某些浏览器可能依赖于内部默认值，只是近似的实际的高度。Some browsers might rely on internal default values, which only approximate the actual height.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的值可以派生自设定的字符大小和实际屏幕像素大小。The returned value can be derived from the assumed character size and actual screen pixel size. 确定宽度的算法使用默认字体大小 （从.config 文件）、 特定于设备的大小 （同样，从.config 文件） 和显式的设备发送的标头的组合。The algorithm for determining the width uses a combination of the default font sizes (from a .config file), device-specific sizes (again, from a .config file), and explicit headers sent by the devices. 这些值不一定精确 （尤其是对于宽度可变的字体，这些值是近似）。These values are not necessarily exact (especially for variable-width fonts, these values are approximate). 某些设备可能依赖于内部默认值，只是近似的实际宽度。Some devices might rely on internal default values, which only approximate the actual width.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `cache-control`值`http-equiv`特性的 HTML``元素允许控制客户端缓存的下载内容，其中包括网页。The `cache-control` value for the `http-equiv` attribute of HTML `` elements allows control over client caching of downloaded content, which includes Web pages. 以下 HTML 片段显示了示例：The following HTML fragment shows an example: ``` ``` 如果`true`，此标记中包含``Web 页面的元素应强制浏览器从服务器重新加载内容。If `true`, the inclusion of this tag in the `` element of a Web page should force the browser to reload content from the server. 如果`false`，服务器控件适配器追加一个默认查询字符串 (`__ufps=``uniquefilepathsuffix`) 到确实已有一个的链接 URL 值。If `false`, server control adapters append a default query string (`__ufps=``uniquefilepathsuffix`) onto link URL values that do not already have one. 这将强制浏览器从服务器重新加载内容。This forces the browser to reload content from the server. 属性也适用于等效的 HTTP 标头形式：The property also applies to the equivalent HTTP header form: ``` CACHE-CONTROL: NO-CACHE ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何确定浏览器是否支持`cache-control`值`http-equiv`特性的 HTML``元素。The following code example shows how to determine whether the browser supports the `cache-control` value for the `http-equiv` attribute of HTML `` elements.
